pages.title: Usage
pages.text: Place the Enchanted Broom on the ground and activate it to mount it. Move forward and backwards, steering left and right as required.$(p)To move vertically, push forward while looking in the desired direction.$(p)Sneak to dismount, and bash it until it breaks to pick it up.

pages.title: Dismounting
pages.text: When dismounting, the Enchanted Broom maintains its momentum, so it is advised to come to a stop first. It's also not recommended to dismount in the air, as the Enchanted Broom will stay there and might be hard to recover afterwards.

pages.title: Other Properties
pages.text: Just like mundane $(l:)Brooms$(/l), an Enchanted Broom can be used to quickly remove $(l:)Circle Glyphs$(/l).$(br)It is also worth nothing that they can be renamed in an $(item)Anvil$() and dyed by using a $(item)Dye$() when placed in the world.$(br)Lastly, it is important to know that if the creature in control of the Enchanted Broom has a $(l:)Owl Familiar$(/l) the Broom will be much easier to control, with better deceleration and the ability to strafe.
